titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 3,4,4'-trichlorocarbanilide.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6365)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/24/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on 3,4,4'-trichlorocarbanilide.
